description: She's graced countless fashion magazine covers. But on Thursday, Brooke Burke-Charvet decided to keep things casual as she worked her way through LAX with her family.
title: Brooke Burke skips make-up and dons leather jacket at LAX
title_page: Brooke Burke skips make-up and dons leather jacket at LAX | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's graced countless fashion magazine covers.
But on Thursday, Brooke Burke-Charvet decided to keep things casual as she worked her way through LAX with her family.
The 45-year-old television presenter and model looked amazingly youthful in her laid-back ensemble.
Scroll down for video
Happy landings! on Thursday, Brooke Burke decided to keep things casual as she worked her way through LAX with her family
On top, the beauty opted for a striking white top with black diagonal stripes and a low v-neck.
Over that she layered a classic black leather biker jacket
Black track pants with red and white stripes down the outside of each leg and some black sneakers rounded out her comfortable look.
Accessories included some oversize shades with dark rose lenses and a large black leather handbag.
Edgy: On top, the beauty opted for a striking white top with black diagonal stripes and a low v-neck paired with a black biker jacket
Fresh-faced! Her brunette tresses were pulled back into a functional bun, and she seemed to forgo make-up with the exception of a dash of light rose lipstick
She also toted a high-style Louis Vuitton rolling carry-on bag.
Her brunette tresses were pulled back into a functional bun, and she seemed to forgo make-up with the exception of a dash of light rose lipstick.
The multi-talented stunner was accompanied by her hunky husband David Charvet, 44, who brought up the rear with a luggage cart towering with baggage.
Heavy hauler: The multi-talented stunner was accompanied by her hunky husband David Charvet, 44, who brought up the rear with a luggage cart towering with baggage
To each their own: Everyone seemed to carry their own bags
It seems the former Wild On! host was returning from a trip to Dallas, as revealed by an Instagram post from earlier in the day.
In that post, her cryptic caption of '[heart emoji] about Dallas | muse fashionista,' was accompanied by a sizzling shot of her famous cleavage.
Her decolletage was on full display in the green frock which also featured a print of stylized leopards.
A massive bejeweled pendant necklace also drew the eye to her ample assets.
